alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 29 at 9:03PM PDT until August 03 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM PDT SATURDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Thunderstorms possible this weekend. Heavy surf up to 7 feet developing Sunday night and continuing through Wednesday, mainly from Northern San Diego County north through Orange County. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal Areas and Orange County Coastal Areas. Increasing surf along south and southwest facing beaches. * WHEN...From 8 AM PDT Saturday through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dangerous cloud to ground lightning from any thunderstorms. Heavy surf and strong rip currents will create dangerous swimming conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Chances for thunderstorms will be Saturday through Sunday. Elevated, heavy surf conditions develop Sunday night and continue through Wednesday.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; San Diego County Coastal Areas
